description: A catheter used to measure pressures in the pulmonary arteries and heart chambers

attributes.name: Presence of Pulmonary Artery Catheter
attributes.description: Indicates whether a pulmonary artery catheter is present or absent

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the pulmonary artery catheter

values.name: New placement
values.description: The catheter has been newly inserted

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The catheter has not changed position or status

values.name: Complication
values.description: There is a complication associated with the catheter

attributes.name: Appropriate location
attributes.description: Indicates whether the catheter is at the appropriate location

values.name: Yes
values.description: The catheter is at the appropriate location

values.name: No
values.description: The catheter is not at the appropriate location

attributes.name: Insertion Site
attributes.description: Indicates the site of catheter insertion

values.name: Internal jugular
values.description: Catheter inserted through the internal jugular vein

values.name: Subclavian
values.description: Catheter inserted through the subclavian vein

values.name: Femoral
values.description: Catheter inserted through the femoral vein

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: Indicates the side of catheter placement

values.name: Left
values.description: Catheter placed on the left side

values.name: Right
values.description: Catheter placed on the right side

attributes.name: Distal tip location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the distal tip of the catheter

values.name: Main pulmonary artery
values.description: Distal tip of the catheter is in the main pulmonary artery

values.name: Right pulmonary artery
values.description: Distal tip of the catheter is in the right pulmonary artery

values.name: Left pulmonary artery
values.description: Distal tip of the catheter is in the left pulmonary artery

attributes.name: Balloon Inflation
attributes.description: Indicates whether the balloon of the catheter is inflated or not at the time of imaging

values.name: Inflated
values.description: Balloon of the catheter is inflated

values.name: Not inflated
values.description: Balloon of the catheter is not inflated
